column4: after installing ubuntu server, I installed ubuntu-extras, but am still getting mp3 playback errors:  https://gist.github.com/3841172   are the codes installed?
pardon, I actually see that vlc plays mp3's fine, while gnome-mplayer gives:  https://gist.github.com/3841172   so it's not codecs or drivers.
perhaps you need ubuntu-restricted-extras or just lame (mp3 decoder)
I have extras, and vlc plays fine.  so why not mplayer?  I'll install lame, but why?
